Money making tips
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Money making tips
By Minion9000 on Tuesday, April 18, 2006 - 07:56 am:

Here are some ways to get a little / lot of extra money.

Shows:

No free shows! :
Get a guild quest to put on a show, you'll make on ave. a extra 4-6 thousand gold

Better tricks = more cash :
you'll notice that you'll see more coins going out for the harder tricks (green, yellow, red clown noses)

Fame = Money! :
The higher your fame in a area the better chance of getting the better coins (bronze =500, sliver = 3000, gold = 20000 (not postive but up there))
Around fame 40 if you do a hard trick well (like 1 or no bads,also harder to get on med or easy tricks till fame gets higher.) you'll start seeing them throw silver coins. Then when your fame goes up to 80 - 90 you'll start seeing gold coins once or twice pre show if your doing hard tricks well. (I have seen a gold doing a med trick tho with my fame up past 90)

Don't chase every coin :
Let some of the little bronze coins go if there not right there because later on when you have 5 monsters doing med and hard tricks you only get on ave 6 tricks off depending how long you take to gather.

Adventure

Missions:
If your going out might as well get a guild mission to capture monsters or items. (Watch out for completing chapters tho, they cancel your guild mission even if you complete it)

selling equipment and material:
Theres not much money in it but you get alot of equipment that you can sell for at least some cash. Materials I wouldn't recommend selling unless you have a lot of them since you can combine things.

Mission items :
Sometimes the reward is a G. tank or something else you can sell. Sadly thou the money you also get isn't much but there are some good tanks later on.

Alright well repeating shows and show guild missions is pretty much the fastest way to make cash once your fame is up there. I made over 60k on one show once :)

Also sorry if theres any spelling and grammer mistakes, (doing this at work, no access to word) and if i'm a little off on how much the gold coin is its either 20 or 25k but the fame should be right.

By Trickster on Tuesday, April 18, 2006 - 11:50 am:

As a note though, when you complete a chapter and get the mission canceled, it doesn't seem to actually *hurt* you, in that it doesn't put you on the Blacklist or anything, it just cancels the mission.

By Minion9000 on Tuesday, April 18, 2006 - 12:30 pm:

Ya Tricksters' right, If the chapter ends you don't get blacklisted for not completing the mission. Though when your able to move on your own the guilds are linked so if you leave town the mission is active and you can get your reward at any guild no matter where you got the mission.

By Minion9000 on Wednesday, April 19, 2006 - 02:10 pm:

First off, gold coins in shows are worth 20k. Alright now on to a actual tip.

Well heres another easy way, cheating also but figured i'd might as well say it first. After the main quest theres a random event on the first of the month called "Lucky Lotto". (happens maybe once or twice a year and you can't be doing something like a adventure or a show.)
Well you buy a ticket that costs 2000g and at the first of the next month or next day your not doing anything in case your doing a show, they say the results and you'll win something.

Prizes are (worst to best)
supple lv. 1
200g
1000g
20000g
200000g

It's like a 1 in 15 chance to get the 200k but if you played monster rancher alot you know all about saving and reloading :)

By Minion9000 on Thursday, April 20, 2006 - 08:01 am:

Add 2000g and object lv.2 to the prizes of the lotto
Also Doing shows with 100 fame and hard tricks will net you serious cash I'm talking 80k-100k on average. 178500 was my best.
And I'm over a million spare gold if anyone is wondering :)

By Kit_Wanderer on Thursday, April 20, 2006 - 04:37 pm:

Add 100g to the lotto too, I seem to get 100 sometimes -.-'

By Pixie Misa on Friday, April 21, 2006 - 01:45 pm:

I got a flower L2 my first time.
